name: Song Liao
content: Song Liao - Song Liao Song Liao Follow Lubbock, TX, United States Email Github Google ScholarI am a Tenure-Track Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at Texas Tech University. My research interests include IoT security/privacy and data science. Specifically, my work is focused on exploring the security and privacy of Voice Personal Assistants (VPA), such as Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.I earned my Ph.D. from Clemson University, where I had the privilege of working under the guidance of Dr. Long Cheng. Before pursuing my Ph.D., I completed both my bachelor’s and master’s degrees at Xi’an Jiaotong University, where I conducted research at the Institute of Artificial Intelligence and Robotics (IAIR) under the mentorship of Dr. Yuehu Liu.News [People] 08/2025: Congrats to Huan for winning the Project ENRICH Scholarship Program from TTU!
